\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{XLCellReference()}{XLCellReference()}\hspace{0.1cm}{\footnotesize\ttfamily [1/5]}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLCell\+Reference\+::\+XLCell\+Reference (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const std\+::string \&}]{cell\+Address = {\ttfamily \char`\"{}\char`\"{}} }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Constructor taking a cell address as argument. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em cell\+Address} & The address of the cell, e.\+g. \textquotesingle{}A1\textquotesingle{}.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
The constructor creates a new \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_cell_reference}{XLCell\+Reference}} from a string, e.\+g. \textquotesingle{}A1\textquotesingle{}. If there\textquotesingle{}s no input, the default reference will be cell A1. \mbox{\Hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_cell_reference_a7172092de7b1d46bcc37ab6f34981fe8}\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_cell_reference_a7172092de7b1d46bcc37ab6f34981fe8}}
